body:
## Scope

Add dunning_paused and dunning_resumed event handling. Preserve and restore state context.

## Relevant AC from spec (#1)

**Pause / Resume:**

- Given active dunning state (OVERDUE, GRACE, REMINDER_1, REMINDER_2, FINAL_NOTICE, SUSPENDED)
  When dunning_paused → PAUSED, preserve previous state and elapsed time

- Given PAUSED state
  When dunning_resumed → return to previous state, timeout resumes from where it left off

- Given PAUSED state
  When payment_received → PAID (payment always wins)

- Given PAUSED state
  When invoice_cancelled → CANCELLED

## Files

- `src/transition.ts` — extend transition function
- `tests/transition.test.ts` — extend tests

## Dependencies

- Depends on: #5 (payment + cancellation — needs terminal state handling)

Refs #1
title: feat(state-machine): implement pause and resume
